# Psychotherapy, Somatic Therapy, Cacao Therapy in Mexico City | mindbodycacao.com

## Overview of Services
[Home](https://mindbodycacao.com/): This is the main page for mindbodycacao.com, providing an introduction to the integrative therapy services offered in Mexico City.

[Therapies](https://mindbodycacao.com/#): A comprehensive overview of the various therapeutic modalities available, including psychotherapy, body therapy, and cacao therapy.

## Types of Therapy
[Psychotherapy](https://mindbodycacao.com/psychotherapy-mental-health-services): Detailed information on psychotherapy services, including individual, couples, and adolescent therapy options.

[Body Therapy](https://mindbodycacao.com/body-therapy): An explanation of body therapy techniques used to promote healing and well-being through physical and emotional integration.

[Cacao Therapy](https://mindbodycacao.com/cacao-therapy-ceremony): Insights into cacao-based therapy, highlighting its benefits and the unique rituals involved in the therapeutic process.

## Target Audiences
[Individuals](https://mindbodycacao.com/individual-therapy): Tailored therapy services designed for individual clients seeking personal growth and healing.

[Couples](https://mindbodycacao.com/couples-therapy): Specialized therapy sessions aimed at couples looking to improve their relationship dynamics.

[Adolescents](https://mindbodycacao.com/adolescents-therapy): Therapy options specifically for adolescents, addressing their unique challenges and developmental needs.

[Parents](https://mindbodycacao.com/parents-therapy): Support and therapy services for parents navigating the complexities of parenting.

[Expats Living in Mexico](https://mindbodycacao.com/english-therapy-mexico-city): Resources and therapy tailored for expatriates adjusting to life in Mexico.

[Mexican Expats](https://mindbodycacao.com/mexican-expats-living-abroad): Services designed for Mexican expatriates returning home or living abroad, focusing on their specific experiences and challenges.

## Additional Resources
[Notes](https://mindbodycacao.com/notes): A section dedicated to additional insights and resources related to therapy and mental health.

[About](https://mindbodycacao.com/about/): Information about the practice, its philosophy, and the team behind mindbodycacao.com.

[Book a free session](https://zcal.co/mindbodycacao/consultation): An option for potential clients to schedule a complimentary consultation to discuss their therapy needs.

## Professional Background
[Tania Chapper, Psychotherapist, M.A.](https://mindbodycacao.com/about): Profile of Tania Chapper, a bilingual therapist with over 10 years of experience in the US and Mexico, specializing in various therapeutic approaches including EMDR and BrainSpotting.

[Free Consultation - Schedule a meeting](https://zcal.co/i/GOmQXX-v): A link to schedule a free consultation with Tania Chapper to explore therapy options.

## Contact Information

[+52 55 6134 2194](tel:+525561342194): Local contact number for clients in Mexico.

## Articles and Insights
[Notes](https://mindbodycacao.com/notes/): Additional notes and insights related to therapy practices and mental health.

[Therapy in Mexico City: Finding Calm in a Big, Beautiful City](https://mindbodycacao.com/therapy/2025/11/30/therapy-in-mexico-city.html): An article discussing the therapeutic landscape in Mexico City and how it can help individuals find peace amidst urban chaos.

[Finding Your Ground Far From Home: The Power of Therapy ...](https://mindbodycacao.com/therapy/2025/11/28/finding-your-ground-far-from-home-expat-therapy.html): An exploration of the importance of therapy for those living away from their home country and the unique challenges they face.

[What Is EMDR and Why It Helps with Trauma](https://mindbodycacao.com/therapy/mind/2025/11/20/what-is-emdr-and-why-it-helps-trauma.html): An informative piece on EMDR therapy, its methodology, and its effectiveness in treating trauma.
